segments.text: I see the woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn't notice anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing out of the sink, and she's completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how much water is on the floor now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so clever, taking those cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is really brave, standing on that stool to reach the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting so patiently for her cookie, it's adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what the woman will do when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she doesn't get too mad at the children, they're just having fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this scene is a perfect example of how life can be so unpredictable.
segments.speaker: PAR
